way p desc1: 30+ years experience in high quality steel pipe and pipe fittings designing, manufacturing, stocking and exporting
way p desc2: Strong cooperation network with raw material mills contribute to a competitive price than market
way p desc3: 24h/day and 7 day/weekly online service is available. All emails, faxes will be replied within 8 working hours
way p desc4: Perfect quality control process and strict & professional quality control team provide 100% quality assurance
about p desc1: ONE STEEL stands as a preeminent product service provider and exporter of steel pipes in China.
about p desc2: With an annual turnover reaching 100 million dollars, a workforce of over 100 dedicated employees, and two state-of-the-art factories specializing in Seamless (SMLS) and Longitudinal Submerged Arc Welded (LSAW) steel pipes, we have significantly expanded our production capabilities. We've also invested in production lines for Electric Resistance Welded (ERW), Spiral Submerged Arc Welded (SSAW) steel pipes, as well as stainless - steel products.True to the essence of our name, “ONE”, each letter embodies a core value:
about p desc3: represents “Outstanding”. ONE STEEL has firmly established itself as an outstanding player in the steel industry. Our continuous pursuit of innovation, advanced production techniques, and strict quality control measures have set us apart from the competition.
about p desc4: stands for “Nobility”. We uphold a noble working style in all aspects of our operations. We strive to be an unwaveringly trustworthy partner to our clients, maintaining the highest standards of integrity, professionalism, and responsibility. This commitment is reflected not only in our business dealings but also in the exceptional quality we deliver across all product lines.
about p desc5: denotes “Excellent”. Our strength lies in our outstanding team members, who bring a wealth of expertise and passion to their work. Coupled with our top - notch customer services and unrivaled product quality, we are dedicated to exceeding customer expectations at every turn.
about p desc6: Guided by our core principle of “OUTSTANDING PRODUCT QUALITY, NOBILITY WORKING STYLE, EXCELLENT TEAMWORK”, we are confident in our ability to offer customers high - quality products at highly competitive prices. If you are interested in any of our products, please do not hesitate to contact us at [sales@onetopsteel.com].

quality desc1: In the race of steel pipe quality control, we deeply understand our customers' strict pursuit of quality. Relying on a professional and complete network of third-party testing partners, we can carry out comprehensive and multi-dimensional testing services for steel pipe products, from chemical composition analysis to mechanical property testing, from non-destructive flaw detection to dimensional accuracy measurement. Each test is performed by authoritative third-party institutions to ensure accurate and reliable data and fair and effective results. With third-party testing as a solid backing, we build a solid quality defense line for every steel pipe leaving the factory and deliver a full-score answer to our customers' trust.
quality desc2: Upholding the principle of quality - first, Onetop attach great importance to product quality control and inspection. We are equipped with a series of advanced testing equipment, such as pendulum impact testing machines, hardness testers, and metallographic microscopes. These enable us to conduct comprehensive and high - precision quality inspections on steel pipes, fully meeting the diverse inspection requirements of our customers. The steel pipes we produce strictly comply with a wide range of domestic and international standards, ensuring reliable quality.
Ultrasonic test for pipe body and weld s: Ultrasonic test for pipe body and weld seam
